Posts.Content:
I posted last week about
 a call back from a mammogram...I was so nervous and asked for an earlier appointment..they had me scheduled for a month later which made me think it wasn't anything..they had a cancellation on Wednesday April 1st and they did another mammogram and an ultrasound and everything is fine..I have REALLY dense breast tissue and last year they did a 3 D mammogram which sort of cuts through the dense tissue and they can see things they haven't seen before...they do want me to come back in 6 months just to be sure because of my history..I'm glad they're watching me closely but a call back can mean nothing and many time that's the case!
Posts.Title: (No Subject)

Posts.Content: I'm not sure how to see replies...thanks for your patience!
Posts.Title: call back after mammo

Posts.Content: Oops...meant to say they said NOT to be alarmed!
